mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscribe (custpin, subcustpin, subdate) VALUES (#{custpin}, #{subcustpin}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.custpin as custpin, A.subcustpin as subcustpin, A.subdate as subdate, B.profileimgname as subcustprofileimgname, B.introduction as subcustintroduction, B.custid as subcustid, B.nickname as subcustnickname FROM subscribe A LEFT OUTER JOIN cust B ON A.subcustpin = B.custpin LEFT OUTER JOIN cust C ON A.custpin = C.custpin WHERE C.custid = #{custid}
